welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Caversham, a charming town known for its historical landmarks and beautiful scenery. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this town has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military personnel and government officials.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers modern facilities for passengers traveling to and from the United Kingdom.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to VIP and business travelers with exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and executive flights at Lasham Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private jet flights and offers VIP services for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
